comments.body:
printf "%-26s%-18s\n" "Boot Date" "IBU Version"; for i in $(ls /home/configBackup/.zfs/snapshot/*/files/var/log/kern* /var/log/kern*); do IFS=$''; result=($(zegrep -ah 'Kernel command line: BOOT_IMAGE=\(loop\)\/vmlinuz' $i)); unset IFS; if [[ -n $result ]]; then for x in "${result[@]}"; do bootDate=$(echo $x  | grep -oE "^[a-zA-Z]{3} [0-9]{1,2} [0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}"); bootIbu=$(echo $x | grep -oP "(?<=(loop=\/images\/))[0-9]{3,4}\.[0-9]"); printf "%-26s%-18s\n" "$bootDate" "$bootIbu"; done; fi; done

Alexandre Desrosiers: https://kaseya.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/5680042
posted in BCDR Support Swarms / 1. Main Swarm Channel on Monday, July 22, 2024 2:18 PM
 
partner confirmed there was a citywide power outaged last wednesday 7/17/24 @ 1:30pm. However, I do not see a reboot occurred on that date. Device powered back on after power restore and then rebooted again on 7/22/24

kernel logs last reboot was 7/22/24 @ 12:02pm:
